com.compendium.ui
Class UIDatabaseUpdate

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.UIDatabaseUpdate
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBConstants, DBConstantsDerby, DBConstantsMySQL, java.io.Serializable
public class UIDatabaseUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBConstants, DBConstantsMySQL, DBConstantsDerby

This class updates a database structure as and when required by different versions of the software.

See Also:

CREATE_VIEWLINK_CONSTRAINT

private static final java.lang.String CREATE_VIEWLINK_CONSTRAINT

progressCount

Set the amount of progress items being counted.

Parameters:
int - nCount, the amount of progress items being counted.

progressUpdate

public static void progressUpdate(int nIncrement,
                                  java.lang.String sMessage)
Indicate that progress has been updated.

Parameters:
int - nCount, the current position of the progress in relation to the inital count.
String - sMessage, the message to display to the user.

progressComplete

public static void progressComplete()
Indicate that progress has complete.

Parameters:
int - nCount, the final position of the progress in relation to the intial count.
String - sMessage, the message to display to the user.
